messages.messageBody:
Hi Kristine,
It was me who bought up the unschooling handbook. That is what it is called
and amazon.com has it. It isn't very expensive and the information is
awesome!!!! I also love the John Holt Time to Learn or something along those
lines.
Rachel

-------Original Message-------

From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Date: Friday, March 29, 2002 09:40:54 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling handbook

Someone mentioned an unschooling handbook and I was wondering if I could get

some feedback about books to read about unschooling. I realize there may be

one BIG BOOK that turned things around, if so I'd like to read it.
Otherwise, additional "top unschooling book" recommendations are very much
appreciated!
Thanks,
Kristine
